transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir, good afternoon.
Executive: Ashraf baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART ke office se.
Customer: Aage boliye.
Executive: Haan haan sir kaise hain aap? Main keh raha hu aapki baat sir na Bhumika se hui thi jo aapke account manager hain present time mein. Toh unhone kaafi saari cheeze aapko batai bhi thi service visit ke regarding ki kaise service use karna hai, hai na sir? Aur aapne kuch do products bhi add kare bole the add karne ke liye toh woh humne add kar diya hai apne end se. Baaki further koi aur bhi issue sir aap face kar rahe the ek traders wala aap bata rahe the ki mere website pe show karta hai traders karke.
Customer: Retailer retailer aa raha hai na usme manufacturer nahi aa raha.
Executive: Achcha achcha toh woh aapne sir jo GST banwai hai na sir, us GST mein yeh aata hai trader retailer likh karke. Agar aap GST update kara loge toh yaha pe fir woh update ho jaata hai agar aap isko ek baar kara lete ho toh. Kyunki government site se hi woh pura update liya jaata hai.
Customer: Haan bol diya hai unko maine.
Executive: Achcha woh aapne bol diya hai. Ho jaaye toh aapko bhej denge.
Executive: Bilkul kar denge sir, bilkul kar denge. Dusri cheez sir, jo buyer aapko sir connect karne ki koshish kar raha hai jo IndiaMART ke through buyers aapko call kar rahe hain woh ho yeh raha hai ki sir bahut saari call aapki miss ho ja rahi hai toh koi hamari taraf se koi dikkat toh nahi aa rahi hai IndiaMART pe aapko? Ab toh calls bhi badh gayi hai aana. Jaise October month mein kaafi calls gayi 18 call receive kara hai, saat call miss hui. Is mahine mein kya hua ki teen hi call receive kari hai saat call miss ho gayi hai. Toh jo buyer aapse try kar rahe hain na baat karke, haan boliye.
Customer: Raat ko raat ko call karte hain na raat ko call thodi office time mein call kare koi free hai na.
Executive: Bilkul sahi baat hai. Toh humne ek option bana rakha hai aapke isme IndiaMART pe. Jaise aap IndiaMART pe jayenge apna account login karenge na sir toh waha pe na settings mein ek PNS call settings ka option hai. Jab laptop ya desktop ke through online aap jaana toh settings mein ek PNS settings ka option hai jisme aapko non office hours ko hata dena hai. Toh isme kya hoga ki aapke paas sirf office hours mein time mein call aayegi. Matlab ki subah 9 baje se shaam ke 7 baje tak aur iske sath sath Monday to Saturday.
Customer: Aayegi sirf. Plus jaise maan lijiye Gandhi Jayanti hai, 26 January hai in dino mein bhi call nahi aayegi aapke paas jaise agar jo matlab national bank holidays hote hain na sir as per RBI.
Customer: Haan haan hona hi aise chahiye.
Executive: Haan matlab jaise sahi baat hai main samajh gaya. Raat ko 12 baje koi 10 baje call aa rahi hai toh uska kaise kya karenge hum?
Customer: Raat ko 12 baje koi 10 baje call aa rahi hai toh uska kaise kya karenge hum?
Executive: Sahi baat hai aur kya? 9 baje so hi rahe hain koi 11 baje call aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji. Toh ek kaam karunga main iska screenshot drink karke na log drink karke aur
Customer: Haan haan. puchte hain sawal.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Haan ji. Theek hai sir, bilkul agree kar raha hu main aapki baat se. call ka kya kare?
Executive: Sahi baat hai aur kya? Khair ek ek tarika aur hai lekin pehle toh yeh aapki settings ke liye na main ek photo khich karke click karke bhejunga screenshot jisko ki aap dekh karke samajh jaoge ki kaha se changes hone hain. Theek hai woh aap kar loge jab free hoge. Dusri cheez maan lijiye koi buyer aapko pareshan kar raha hai, theek hai ek baar usne lagaya hai na kuch toh faltu baatein kar raha hai fir se lagaya maan lo aap samajh gaye ki yeh wahi baat kar raha hai call pe toh aapko karna kya hai during the call jo keypad mein ja kar ke hai na usme hash aur one press kar denge toh agli baar woh buyer aapke website pe call nahi kar payega. Woh spam ho jayega number usko uska.
Executive: Khair iski zarurat nahi padegi aapko mujhe nahi lagta itna koi spam karta hoga but aisa hota hai toh yeh ek tarika hai. Aapka jo settings office settings woh sahi kara deta hu main abhi hai na aur office office time mein call aaye bas hamare ko.
Customer: Office office time mein call aaye bas hamare ko.
Executive: Haan haan nahi nahi woh wala setting hai hamare paas. Woh wala setting hai mere paas. Sir buyleads ka consumption thoda badhana padega aapki jo main category hai moong seeds hai na wheat seeds wheat seeds ka toh khair kam hi use karte ho moong seeds ki lead lena aapne band kar diya hai idhar. Customer mil nahi pa raha hai kya?
Customer: Moong seed moong seed ka is time hi nahi hai na abhi moong seed saari sell kar diya humne.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Toh abhi kya kya hai mein sell karna?
Customer: Abhi toh wheat aur barley ke hi chal rahe hain.
Executive: Chaliye chaliye iski thodi lead sir consume kariyega.
Customer: Mustard mustard ka off ho gaya SSG ka off ho gaya.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Aur bajra ka off hai, moong ka off hai.
Executive: Achcha ek question aur tha sir ki jaise Bhumika ne kuch sahi se nahi bataya tha ki aapne matlab jo ek aapke paas feedback aata hai na whatsapp pe toh usme aapne not satisfied mark kar diya tha ki matlab Bhumika ke baaton se aap satisfied nahi ho jo bhi usne cheeze batai ya pata nahi aapse hua ki kisse kisne kiya hai negative feedback aa gaya tha ki matlab ki Bhumika ne sahi se bataya nahi jabki I think usne kaafi time diya tha aapko saari cheeze kari bhi do product aapne diya usne add bhi kar diya tha.
Customer: Haan dobara bolenge.
Executive: Haan haan abhi toh khair dobara toh nahi haan dobara jayega woh aap Bhumika ke liye likh dijiyega usme ki nahi usne matlab jo hai services ke bare mein kaafi achcha bataya tha. Baaki main aapko whatsapp kar raha hu ki woh changes kaise karne hai jo aapko chahiye actually mein hai na sir?
Customer: Ji theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Thoda sa rating pe dhyan dijiyega IndiaMART ka aur jo lead manager aap use kar rahe ho us pe aap thoda sa lead manager use karna start kariye kyunki main dekhta hu na ki reply nahi ja raha hai lead manager ke through. Reviews chalo aapke achche hain 4.3 out of 5 hai nau logo ne diya hai. Call picking rate toh maine bata hi diya kaise karna hai aapko hai na aur inquiry pe sab pe reply kariye lead manager ke through. Buylead bas aap lena start kar dijiye jis product line mein abhi aap deal karna chah rahe ho toh aapko customer milna start ho jayega. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek sir okay okay theek thank you sir.
(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Retailer showing instead of manufacturer on website.

- Receiving calls at odd hours.

- Stopped taking buyleads for moong seeds.

- Customer marked 'not satisfied' in feedback.



Resolution:

- Advised to update GST for retailer issue.

- Executive will send screenshot for call settings.

- Provided steps to block spam callers.

- Suggested to start taking buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to send screenshot for call settings.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, call settings, spam, buyleads, feedback
